Name: Godless grove
About the game: Godless grove - survival horror game with elements of an open world hunting simulator. Adapt to the changing conditions of the grove, learn how to survive, discover the terrible secrets of the locals and overcome the disgusting creatures of evil that filled this forest. . ● The oppressive atmosphere of a dying East Slavic village ● Get food and resources by hunting. Use decoys, traps and don't make too much noise ● Fight terrible monsters and find a way to stop them forever ● High difficulty, the decision to engage in direct combat can cost you a life
Meta Title: Godless grove: May 26, 2022, Panzershark and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Godless grove? Check out the release date (May 26, 2022), developer insights from Panzershark, and a complete game summary.
